items.content_text: Musk [cheating at video games](https://daringfireball.net/linked/2025/02/03/elon-musk-cheats-at-video-games) should be enough to sink his nerd cred, but I know the fanboys will just spin it into how cool it is that he's so rich he doesn't have to bother playing video games himself. What a clown.

items.content_html:
This guide to using Signal for USA government workers works just as well as a primer for using Signal for the rest of us, with all the nerd security details written up.

I also like how you can reset your “find me on Signal” URL so you can give it out and then easily stop it from working later.
items.content_text: This [guide to using Signal for USA government workers](https://a.wholelottanothing.org/a-guide-to-using-signal-for-government-workers/) works just as well as a primer for using Signal for the rest of us, with all the nerd security details written up. I also like how you can reset your "find me on Signal" URL so you can give it out and then easily stop it from working later.

items.content_html: Meta Quest VR stuff is wild. It shouldn’t be too surprising that Meta tries to connect all the things… but in Horizons app afterwards, it shows basically every VR “person” I walked past as a possible connection. I didn’t talk or interact with any of them. Some are kids I’m sure.
items.content_text: Meta Quest VR stuff is wild. It shouldn't be too surprising that Meta tries to connect all the things... but in Horizons app afterwards, it shows basically every VR "person" I walked past as a possible connection. I didn't talk or interact with any of them. Some are kids I'm sure.

items.content_html: Kid From the Opposing Team: ‚ÄúThe kid was smiling!‚Äù Me working the penalty box: ‚ÄúYou tripped him and so he drew a penalty.‚Äù Kid: ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt mean to.‚Äù Me: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think the refs care.‚Äù Kid: ‚ÄúThese refs are fixed.‚Äù Me: ‚ÄúYep. items.content_text:
Kid From the Opposing Team: ‚ÄúThe kid was smiling!‚Äù
Me working the penalty box: ‚ÄúYou tripped him and so he drew a penalty.‚Äù
Kid: ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt mean to.‚Äù
Me: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think the refs care.‚Äù
Kid: ‚ÄúThese refs are fixed.‚Äù
Me: ‚ÄúYep. Div C games are that high stakes that someone paid off the ref.‚Äù üòÇ

items.content_html:
Up until 1 to pick up oldest from a winter formal at school, awake until 2:30 waiting for him to get home from taking pics at an odr, then up at 6:30 when youngest decides to make French toast first thing.

I‚Äôm starting to see the appeal of kids eventually moving out on their own. üòÇ üò¥

items.content_html:
I slipped on the ice while taking Neville for a walk tonight. I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll feel some random muscle pain in 2 days.

As much as 2C in January is nice, it‚Äôs awful for the sidewalks. I was ready to sell the house and move to Mexico.
